name: Life Beyond
description:
Life Beyond is a 2D platformer game made in 3 days for an event in my school. It was made by me and 4 my teammates- Alex, Boris, Zlati and Danyl. The goal of the game is to reach the final planet by beating the final boss.

Download instructions:

1. Donload the provided .zip file

2. Unzip the file into a chosen directory

3. Run the Life Beyond.exe file
